response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored just for you. Given its immense value and your appreciation for it, we're extending this opportunity to acquire the item for $14,000. This is a special offer considering its worth to both of us. We believe this price reflects the quality and benefits you'll receive, while ensuring a fair transaction for us. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
